transcription.text: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film 'Four Jills in a Jeep' featuring Kay Francis, Carole Landis, Martha Raye, and Mitzi Mayfair distributed by 20th Century Fox Pictures. Three pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details. Kay Francis, Carole Landis, Martha Raye, and Mitzi Mayfair as themselves, re-enacting their USO tour of Europe and North Africa during World War II.

work.title: Four Jills in a Jeep cinema slide
